alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 17 at 11:06PM MST until August 18 at 12:15AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 215 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas, especially along and near the San Simon Wash in the northern Tohono O`odham Nation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1101 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated between 1.00 and 2.50 inches of rain have fallen near the village of Vaya Chin on Route 34 over the past few hours. Rainfall runoff will fill into the San Simon Wash...resulting in a heavy flow of water in that wash as it moves south and intersects Highway 86. - This includes the following streams and drainages... San Simon Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Simon, Vaya Chin and San Simon West. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
